dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Wavenet Softphone
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
Wavenet Softphone
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
Wavenet Softphone does not access your music. This permission may appear due to system audio frameworks.
This app uses Bluetooth for call audio and headset connections.
This app uses Bluetooth for connecting to audio devices.
Wavenet Softphone does not use your calendar. This is required by underlying frameworks for scheduling or notifications.
This app requires camera access for video calls.
Wavenet Softphone may access your contacts to show caller information and simplify dialing.
This app uses the local network for communication and call connectivity.
Wavenet Softphone does not track location. This is required by network and background service APIs.
Wavenet Softphone does not use your location. This is required for Wi-Fi or Bluetooth network access.
This app requires microphone access for audio calls.
Wavenet Softphone does not collect motion data. This permission is included for background audio framework compatibility.
Wavenet Softphone integrates with iOS CallKit and may use Siri for voice call control.
Wavenet Softphone does not perform speech recognition. This permission may be referenced by iOS audio APIs.
We use analytics to improve call quality and performance. No personal tracking is done.
This app uses voip to make push notifications about calls.
LaunchScreen
Main
